title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 289/97 of 18 February 1997 subjecting the issue of import licences for processed tomatoes originating in Turkey to special conditions
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 289/97 of 18 February 1997 subjecting the issue of import licences for processed tomatoes originating in Turkey to special conditions
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
